description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Quvurlarni o'rnatish, ta'mirlash va boshqa santexnik xizmatlar. Narxi: 100,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Установка, ремонт труб и другие сантехнические услуги. Цена: 100,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Installation and repair of pipes and other plumbing services. Price: 100,000 UZS.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Uy, ofis va boshqa joylarni sifatli tozalash xizmati. Narxi: 80,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Качественная уборка домов, офисов и других помещений. Цена: 80,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: High-quality cleaning for homes, offices, and other spaces. Price: 80,000 UZS.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Elektr simlarini o‘rnatish va muammolarni bartaraf qilish. Narxi: 120,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Установка электропроводки и устранение неисправностей. Цена: 120,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Installation of wiring and fixing electrical problems. Price: 120,000 UZS.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Og‘ir yuk ko‘tarish, qurilishga yordam berish va boshqa jismoniy ishlar. Narxi: 70,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Подъём тяжестей, помощь на стройке и другая физическая работа. Цена: 70,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Lifting, construction help, and other physical tasks. Price: 70,000 UZS.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Bolalarni parvarish qilish, o‘yin o‘ynash, ovqatlantirish. Narxi: 90,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Уход за детьми, игры, кормление и присмотр. Цена: 90,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Taking care of children, playing games, feeding and supervision. Price: 90,000 UZS.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Tibbiy parvarish, igna qilish, dori berish va bemorlarga yordam. Narxi: 150,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Медицинский уход, уколы, лекарства и помощь пациентам. Цена: 150,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Medical care, injections, medication, and patient assistance. Price: 150,000 UZS.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Yig‘ish, ta'mirlash va qurilish ishlari bo‘yicha usta. Narxi: 110,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Мастер по сборке, ремонту и строительству. Цена: 110,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Specialist in assembly, repair, and construction. Price: 110,000 UZS.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Tug‘ilgan kun, to‘y, korporativ va boshqa tadbirlarni tashkillashtirish. Narxi: 200,000 so'm.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Организация дней рождений, свадеб и других мероприятий. Цена: 200,000 сум.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Organizing birthdays, weddings, and corporate events.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Bog‘ va hovlilarga qarash, daraxt va gullarni parvarishlash, sug‘orish va obodonlashtirish ishlari.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Уход за садами и дворами, полив, обрезка деревьев и благоустройство.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Garden and yard care, tree trimming, watering, and landscaping.

description.\ud83c\udf1f O'zbekcha: Tadbirlarni tashkil etish, muvofiqlashtirish va professional boshqaruv.
description.\ud83c\udf10 \u0420\u0443\u0441\u0441\u0: Организация, координация и профессиональное управление мероприятиями.
description.\ud83c\uddec\ud83c\udde7 English: Event planning, coordination, and professional management.
